content: why should adults have all the best socks it s easy to adapt the basic 4ply socks pattern to fit smaller feet - perfect for using up leftovers and introducing youngsters to the joys of hand-knits at an early age based on the basic 4ply socks pattern you can use the winwick mum sockalong tutorials to help knit these socks even if you ve never knitted socks before the blog post containing all the pattern information and the pdf download link is here https //www winwickmum co uk/2023/01/basic-4ply-childrens-socks-free-pattern html 1 1 https //www winwickmum co uk/2023/01/basic-4ply-childrens-socks-free-pattern html
